fields.name: the_ordinary
fields.brand_info:
The Ordinary's mission statement is to make skincare more accessible; protecting your skin is something that we should all be able to achieve, not a luxury that only a few can attain.

This brand owes its fame mainly to two elements: the quality and effectiveness of its products, formulated in a targeted way for the diverse needs of the different skin types, and the very competitive price.

The Ordinary has confirmed that it is truly cruelty-free. They don't test finished products or ingredients on animals, and neither do their suppliers or any third-parties.

fields.name: glossier
fields.ethos: Beauty products inspired by real life
fields.brand_info:
We create the products you tell us you wish existed. We believe in thoughtful design, and enabling conversation (which is where it all starts). But most of all, we believe that beauty is about having fun, wherever you are in your journey. -wwww.glossier.com

Glossier stands out in the beauty industry due to a unique direct relationship with their consumers. A key driver of this relationship is the authentic, two-way communication that is achieved via Into the Gloss and social media platforms. Glossier listens to its consumers about what they want to create the products we need.

fields.name: The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% Zinc 1%
fields.description: A universal serum for blemish-prone skin that smooths, brightens, and supports.
fields.ingredients_list: Aqua (Water), Niacinamide, Zinc Pca, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Pentylene Glycol, Carrageenan, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ethoxydiglycol, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin

fields.name: Lume Illumination Face Mask
fields.description: The Illumination Mask contains kaolin clay - the most gentle clay on the planet, Kakadu Plum and Aloe Vera for a nourishing and hydrated glow.

fields.name: PROVEN Day Moisturiser with SPF
fields.description: From sensitivity, oil, acne, redness, hyperpigmentation, fine lines and more, our specially formulated moisturizer is tailored to meet your skin’s needs.

fields.name: Mario Badescu Cucmber Toning Mist
fields.description:
Known for their accessible formulas that do exactly what they promise, Mario Badescu boasts a sizeable arsenal of skin solutions. 
Harnessing quality ingredients, the now world-renowned brand offers answers to every skin concern imaginable and you can trust Mario Badescu's Facial Spray With Aloe, Cucumber And Green Tea boasts an invigorating infusion of restorative green tea and cooling peppermint essential water for a revived effect.
fields.ingredients_list: Aqua (Water/​Eau), Propylene Glycol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Water, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Propanediol, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzophenone-4, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 42090 (Blue 1), Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool

fields.name: The Ordinary AHA 30% BHA 2% Peeling Solution
fields.description: Alpha hydroxy acids (AHAs) exfoliate the skin’s topmost layer for a brighter, more even appearance, while beta hydroxy acids (BHAs) exfoliate the skin more deeply to clear pore congestion. Combined in one unique solution, these advanced acids offer extraordinary exfoliation to help battle blemishes and boost radiance.
fields.ingredients_list: Glycolic Acid, Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Daucus Carota Sativa Extract, Propanediol, Cocamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Salicylic Acid, Potassium Citrate, Lactic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Citric Acid, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/​Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 20, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol

fields.name: The Ordinary Vitamin C Suspension 23%
fields.description: Formulated as an antidote to ageing, this antioxidant-rich elixir is also enhanced with hyaluronic acid to hydrate and plump skin while brightening and improving uneven skin tone. Ideally applied at bedtime, this extraordinary treatment allows you to wake up to visibly luminous, younger-looking skin.
fields.ingredients_list: N/A

fields.name: Tatcha The Camelia Cleansing Oil
fields.description: This moisturising 2-in-1 makeup remover and cleanser is formulated with camellia oil to gently remove even waterproof makeup, melt away excess oil, and nourish skin to feel softer than silk.

fields.name: Elf SuperSmooth 4% AHA Toner
fields.description: Dull, lackluster skin meet the e.l.f. Skin's SuperSmooth 4% AHA Toner, a gently daily face toner that helps remove dead skin cells to reveal a more radiant, bright complexion. This chemical exfoliant is powered by glow-inducing glycolic acid, an Alpha Hydroxy Acid with low pH that helps tone, balance and clear skin.

fields.name: Botanics All Bright Hydrating Moisturiser
fields.description: This lightweight moisturiser is powered by natural AHAs (that stands for alpha hydroxy acids) found in the hibiscus flower to help gently exfoliate skin and supercharge your glow whilst keeping skin hydrated for up to 12 hours. 84% of people said they saw an instant improvement in skin texture after using this moisturiser.

fields.name: Neutrogena HydroBoost Moisturiser
fields.description:
Experience refreshing hydration with Neutrogena Hydroboost Gel Cream Moisturiser, an oil and fragrance-free moisturiser that intensively replenishes skin.

Recommended for extra-dry skin, the cream delivers a refreshing veil of hydration and contains a unique Hyaluronic Gel Matrix that locks in and continuously releases hydration when needed throughout the day. Skin is left feeling supple with a youthful bounce.

fields.name: The Ordinary Lactic Acid 10% + HA 2%
fields.description:
Formulated to provide mild exfoliation, the Lactic Acid 10% + HA 2% Superficial Peeling Formulation from The Ordinary promotes a smoother, more evenly-toned complexion. 

The serum is fortified lactic acid, an exfoliating alpha hydroxy acid (AHA), to help improve the appearance of pigmentation, uneven skin tone and texture.

fields.name: La Rosche Posay Anthelios Sunscreen
fields.description:
The formula is water, sweat and sand resistant for long-lasting, ultra-high protection. Designed with comfort in mind, the cream hydrates skin without feeling greasy.

Fragrance-free and with a gentle, anti-eye-stinging formula, the SPF showcases the best of the brand’s skincare technology, tested for efficacy and mildness.

fields.name: Glossier Super Serum Duo
fields.description:
For enhanced hydration, apply Super Bounce, a Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin b5 serum that boosts moisture and eases any tight, dry feeling skin may have

For a smoother, more even tone, use Super Glow, a Vitamin C + Magnesium serum that nourishes and energizes so skin looks fresh, recharged, and glowy

fields.name: Glossier The Solution
fields.description:
Unlike physical scrubs, Solution uses a 10% blend of skincare acids to “unglue” dead skin and sweep it away, so your complexion appears smoother, softer, and glowier
Includes three acid groups: Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA), Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA), and Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA)
Daily use helps improve the appearance of blemishes, visible redness, and enlarged pores
fields.ingredients_list:
Active Ingredients: Salicylic Acid (0.5%)
Inactive Ingredients: Aqua/​Water/​Eau, Sodium Hydroxide, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Gluconolactone, Propanediol, Ethoxydiglycol, Magnesium Chloride, Glycereth-7 Trimethyl Ether, Niacinamide, Betaine, Inositol, Citric Acid, Glycerin, Phytic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum/​Fragrance, Peg-8, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Acetic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide

fields.name: La Rosche Posay Effaclar Duo Set
fields.description: A dermatologist recommended 2-step skincare regime for oily, blemish-prone skin. This 2-step kit is clinically proven to reduce the appearance of blemishes, unclog pores and reduce pore size whilst hydrating skin and reducing the appearance of marks. Visibly clearer skin in 4 weeks. For use morning and night as your daily routine.

fields.name: Derma E Vitamin C Cleanser
fields.description: Vitamin C is a proven anti-ageing ingredient that helps to brighten and smooth the skin, protecting it from environmental aggressors that can lead to collagen breakdown, wrinkles and sagging. Within this brilliant foaming face wash, Golden Turmeric and Ancient Rice bring anti-inflammatory, antibacterial and purifying properties. By removing dirt and dead cells, it leaves your skin brighter, smoother and glowing.

fields.name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5
fields.description:
Penetrating the skin to reach its deeper layers, The Ordinary's Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 delivers lasting hydration and offers visible plumping and moisture retention so that skin looks smoother, softer and healthier.

The hyaluronic acid at the centre of this super serum attracts up to 1000 times its weight in water, while a brilliant boost of vitamin B5 heals dry and damaged areas by stabilising the skin's barrier function and promoting the growth of stronger tissue. After taking the beautysphere by storm (read: intense hurricane), The Ordinary even released a {bigger size} – so you can spend even longer with your beloved skin-boosting formula between empties.
fields.ingredients_list: Aqua (Water), Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Panthenol, Ahnfeltia Concinna Extract, Glycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Isoceteth-20, Ethoxydiglycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol

It is a refreshing water type emulsion that’s light and easy to wipe off and gets absorbed into the skin.
It provides moisture to unbalanced oily skin making it feel refreshed.

Nourishes Skin.
Improves skin elasticity.
Smooths skin.
Hydrates dry, itchy skin.

fields.description:
Purified water alternative ocean deep water 75%.
Rich in minerals, allowing moisturization, revitalization and soothing effect on the skin.

fields.name: Tatcha The Deep Cleanse
fields.description:
Enjoy soft, hydrated skin with Tatcha The Deep Cleanse, an oil-free facial wash that provides skin with a deep, gentle exfoliation with the help of natural luffa fruit. Lifting away dirt and minimising excess oil, this cleanser works to unclog and tighten the look of pores.

The gel formula lathers into a creamy foam to rinse away dirt and oil without over-drying the skin. Kind enough for even the most delicate skin, this gentle skincare formula also features amino acids derived from silk for a refreshed and comfortably hydrated complexion

fields.name: Isntree Hyularonic Acid Toner
fields.description: INSTREE Hyaluronic Acid Toner Plus is a deeply moisturising toner with a dense texture and powerful formula. It hydrates dry, flaky and tight skin with abundant moisture and nutrients until it’s plump, firm and rejuvenated with a smooth texture. The 5 hyaluronic acids penetrate your skin completely, providing moisture at every level instantly with varying molecule sizes. The toner also contains cooling aloe barbedensis extract, soothing Centella Asiatica extract, and green tea antioxidants to protect your skin too. Use this toner to energise your skin with moisture and provide protective nutrients to lock in hydration for longer.
fields.ingredients_list: Water, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Trehalose, Sodium PCA, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Glycerin, Hyaluronic Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Althaea Rosea Root Extract, Betula Alba Juice, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Beta-Glucan, Betaine, Panthenol, Cellulose Gum, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Scutellaria Baicalensis Extract

fields.name: Poko Luxury Facial Oil
fields.description: A luxury CBD facial oil that is rich in omega fatty acids to help promote skin softness and plumpness. Designed to repair the skin’s natural moisture barrier, which stops free radicals.
fields.ingredients_list: Crambe seed oil (abyssinica), pomegranate oil (punica granatum), CBD isolate (300mg), moringa oil (moringa oleifera), baobab oil (adansonia digitata), rose essential oil (rosa damascena), neroli essential oil (citrus aurantium), sandalwood essential oil (santalum spicatum), lavender essential oil (lavandula angustifolia), frankincense essential oil (boswellia carteri), ylang ylang essential oil (cananga odorata),geranium essential oil (pelargonium roseum), orange essential oil (citrus sinensis).

fields.name: Pearlessence Face Mist
fields.description: Formulated with coconut water, which rehydrates the skin and provides a new glow; rose, which is hydrating, high in antioxidants and great at reducing redness and inflammation and aloe vera, which is light, healing and hydrating.
fields.ingredients_list: Water, Rosa Centifolia Flower Water Extract, Glycerin, Aloe Vera Leaf Juice, Witch Hazel Distillate, Coconut Water, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Benzophenone-4, Red 40, Fragrance

fields.name: Herbivore Prism Face Mask
fields.description:
Designed for weekly use, this mask contains 20% AHAs and 5% BHA, both of which are fruit-based. Together, these blends work to exfoliate dull, dead skin cells to reveal a brighter complexion. To keep the skin feeling supple and moisturised, a blend of rosewater and aloe vera help to deliver hydration.

The Herbivore Prism 20% AHA + 5% BHA Exfoliating Glow Facial can be used up to twice each week. Begin by applying a thin layer to cleansed skin, then leave to take effect for 10-15 minutes. Finally, rinse thoroughly with warm water.
fields.ingredients_list: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit/​Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Leuconostoc/​Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Populus Tremuloides Bark Extract, Gluconolactone, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Sodium Phytate

fields.name: Herbivore Bakuchiol Retinol Alternative Serum
fields.description: Visibly improve the look of fine lines and wrinkles and firm the skin with the Herbivore Moon Fruit Serum. A great alternative to retinol, this jelly-textured serum is enriched with 1% Bakuchiol that provides wrinkle-smoothing benefits, minus the dryness, redness and irritation. Plant-based peptides and schisandra berry also help to firm the look of skin and belongs in your skincare routine.
fields.ingredients_list: Aqua/​Water/​Eau, Triheptanoin, Propanediol, C9-12 Alkane, Simmondsia Chinensis(Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Glycerin, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Bakuchiol, Schisandra Chinensis Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Eragrostis Tef Seed Extract, Anigozanthos Flavidus Flower/​Leaf Extract, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Morus Alba Fruit Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Nut Extract, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Caprylyl/​Capryl Glucoside, Sclerotium Gum, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Citric Acid, Coco-Caprylate/​Caprate, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Phytate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lauryl Glucoside, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Diisopropyl Adipate, Triethyl Citrate, Caprylic/​Capric Triglyceride, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Extract, Alcohol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis(Orange) Peel Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Leaf/​Twig Extract, Cinnamomum Camphora Linalooliferum Wood Extract

fields.name: Xi-Xi Vitamin C Serum
fields.description:
This radiance-reviving oil blends argan, sea buckthorn and grape-seed oils to nourish and moisturise dry skin.
Fresh, energising aroma courtesy of natural orange peel.
fields.ingredients_list: Aqua, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, DMDM Hydantoin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Perfume, Allantoin, Niacinamide, Sodium Acetate, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Isopropyl Alcohol, Cellulose

fields.name: The Cleanser by Curology
fields.description: Curology’s cleanser and moisturizer are designed to work well for all skin types, including oily! The cleanser helps maintain your skin’s natural moisture barrier, and the moisturizer locks in moisture while keeping your skin’s hydration levels balanced over time. They’re also great for sensitive, acne-prone skin, because they’re formulated with non-comedogenic ingredients and free of parabens, sulfates, fragrances, dyes, or other common irritating ingredients.
fields.ingredients_list: Water, Acrylates Copolymer, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Xylitylglucoside, Propanediol, Coco-Glucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Stearic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xylitol, Panthenol, Coconut Alcohol, Citric Acid, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Chloride, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Leaf Extract
